## TilingScheme.(constructor)

Constructs a new `TilingScheme` with the given subdivision scheme and projection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(subdivisionScheme: SubdivisionScheme, projection: Projection);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  subdivisionScheme | [SubdivisionScheme](./harp-geoutils.subdivisionscheme.md) | The subdivision scheme used by this <code>TilingScheme</code>. |
|  projection | [Projection](./harp-geoutils.projection.md) | The projection used by this <code>TilingScheme</code>. |
